title: Mysql_Mcp_Server
description: A secure MySQL MCP server that enables AI assistants to interact with MySQL databases for table listing, data reading, and SQL query execution in a controlled manner.
creator: designcomputer

MYSQL_HOST.description: The hostname for the MySQL database.

MYSQL_USER.description: The username to authenticate with the MySQL database.

MYSQL_PASSWORD.description: The password to authenticate with the MySQL database.

MYSQL_DATABASE.description: The name of the MySQL database to connect to.
